鯵のひらき: (あじのひらき) - horse mackerel, cut open and dried
鯵の開き: (あじのひらき) - horse mackerel, cut open and dried

鰤子: (ブリッコ) - woman or girl who acts cute by playing innocent and helpless

鰯粕: (いわしかす) - fish cake (made from sardines, used as a fertilizer); sardine meal

鰹節: (かつぶし) - katsuobushi; small pieces of sliced dried bonito

鰻ざく: (うざく) - eel and cucumber salad, finely sliced, dressed in sake, soy, and vinegar
